info.title: Malaysia Visa-Free Entry & MDAC
info.subtitle: Chinese passport holders: visa-free for 30 days since Dec 1, 2023

visa.title: ‚úì Visa-Free Policy
items: Since December 1, 2023, Chinese passport holders can enter Malaysia visa-free for up to 30 days.
‚Ä¢ Applies to tourism, family visits, business, and similar purposes
‚Ä¢ Passport must be valid for at least 6 months
‚Ä¢ All travelers must complete MDAC (Malaysia Digital Arrival Card) before entry - completely free

entry.title: üõÇ Entry Requirements
items: ‚Ä¢ Passport valid for at least 6 months with blank pages
‚Ä¢ Complete MDAC within 3 days before arrival (3 calendar days before entry)
‚Ä¢ Return flight or onward travel proof
‚Ä¢ Accommodation confirmation (hotel booking) or contact in Malaysia
‚Ä¢ Sufficient travel funds proof

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Must present MDAC PIN or confirmation email screenshot upon entry
‚Ä¢ Prohibited items: meat, alcohol, tobacco, and other restricted goods
‚Ä¢ Recommended to book flights and hotels in advance, prepare some cash for funds proof
‚Ä¢ Note MDAC submission time window, early submissions will be rejected by the system

requirements.introSubtitle: These items are required to submit the Malaysia Digital Arrival Card

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid at least 6 months with blank pages
validPassport.details: Malaysia immigration requires your passport to remain valid >=6 months beyond your entry date. Renew before traveling if needed.

submissionWindow.title: Within 3-day window
submissionWindow.description: MDAC only accepts submissions within 3 calendar days before arrival
submissionWindow.details: Count calendar days based on Malaysia time (GMT+8). If it is too early the system will reject the request‚Äîset a reminder to submit once inside the window.

contactableEmail.title: Reachable email inbox
contactableEmail.description: Able to receive the confirmation email and MDAC PIN
contactableEmail.details: Use an email you can log into overseas. Check spam for messages from imigresen.gov.my and keep the PIN handy for arrival.

travelDetails.title: Flight & stay details
travelDetails.description: Have your flight number, arrival port, accommodation and phone ready
travelDetails.details: The form asks for airline, flight number, arrival airport, address in Malaysia, phone number (with country code), and purpose of visit.

captchaReady.title: Captcha ready
captchaReady.description: Able to type the letters/numbers shown before submitting
captchaReady.details: MDAC uses an alphanumeric CAPTCHA. If the code is unclear you can refresh it‚Äîcomplete submission within 5 minutes to avoid timeout.

success.title: Great! You can proceed.
success.subtitle: Next we will confirm your travel information.

warning.title: Please review each item
warning.subtitle: Ensure you meet the MDAC prerequisites before continuing.

info.title: Singapore Visa-Free Entry & SG Arrival Card
info.subtitle: Chinese passport holders: visa-free for 30 days since Feb 9, 2024

visa.title: ‚úì Visa-Free Policy
items: Since February 9, 2024, Chinese ordinary passport holders can enter Singapore visa-free for up to 30 days.
‚Ä¢ Applies to tourism, family visits, business, and other private matters
‚Ä¢ Work or stays exceeding 30 days require a visa in advance
‚Ä¢ Official passport holders also enjoy visa-free entry

entry.title: üõÇ Entry Requirements
items: ‚Ä¢ Passport valid for at least 6 months
‚Ä¢ Complete SG Arrival Card within 3 days before arrival
‚Ä¢ Return flight or onward travel proof
‚Ä¢ Sufficient funds for stay (cash, credit cards, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Accommodation confirmation or local contact information

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Must complete SG Arrival Card within 3 days before arrival with accurate information
‚Ä¢ Prohibited items: drugs, protected wildlife products
‚Ä¢ Be cautious with medications, alcohol, cash; never carry items for strangers
‚Ä¢ Stay calm during customs inspection, never offer bribes

info.continueButton: Got it, continue to the checklist

requirements.introSubtitle: Singapore only accepts arrivals with declarations completed inside the 3-day window

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport should be valid 6+ months beyond arrival
validPassport.details: Singapore recommends at least 6 months validity. Renew or replace damaged passports before travel.

submissionWindow.title: Within 3-day submission window
submissionWindow.description: Form opens 3 days before arrival (Singapore time, GMT+8)
submissionWindow.details: Submitting earlier than the window will result in an error. Set a reminder to complete the SG Arrival Card once the clock reaches the window.

travelDetails.title: Travel & stay information
travelDetails.description: Flight, arrival terminal/border, lodging/contact, purpose of visit
travelDetails.details: Prepare your airline/ferry/bus details, stay address, and contact number in international format. Business travelers should list local sponsor info if available.

familyGroups.title: Group/family plan
familyGroups.description: Decide if you will submit individually or through family submission
familyGroups.details: Group submission supports up to 10 travelers. Have everyone's passport details ready and confirm that minors are included in a guardian's form.

sgArrivalHistory.title: Previous submissions
sgArrivalHistory.description: Remember SG Arrival Cards expire after a single entry
sgArrivalHistory.details: If you re-enter within a short period, submit a fresh declaration with updated travel details. Old entries cannot be reused.

success.title: You are ready!
success.subtitle: Next we will pre-fill your travel details for the SG Arrival Card.

warning.title: Review each checklist item
warning.subtitle: Complete the prerequisites before moving on.

info.title: Hong Kong Visa-Free Entry
info.subtitle: Chinese passport holders: visa-free for up to 7 days

visa.title: ‚úì Visa-Free Policy
items: Chinese passport holders can enter Hong Kong visa-free for tourism, business, and family visits for up to 7 days.
‚Ä¢ Extension applications should be submitted to Hong Kong Immigration Department if needed
‚Ä¢ No pre-registration is required for visa-free entry
‚Ä¢ Make sure you have valid onward travel arrangements

entry.title: üõÇ Entry Requirements
items: ‚Ä¢ Valid passport with at least 1 month validity beyond your intended stay
‚Ä¢ Return or onward travel ticket
‚Ä¢ Proof of accommodation (hotel booking or host contact)
‚Ä¢ Sufficient funds for your stay
‚Ä¢ Complete health declaration if required

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Have your return ticket and hotel booking confirmation ready for immigration inspection
‚Ä¢ Prohibited items: drugs, weapons, and endangered species products
‚Ä¢ Be prepared to show proof of sufficient funds if asked
‚Ä¢ Comply with all immigration officer instructions

requirements.introSubtitle: Make sure you meet all requirements before traveling to Hong Kong

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport should be valid for at least 1 month beyond your stay
validPassport.details: Hong Kong requires your passport to be valid beyond your intended stay. Check expiry date and renew if necessary.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.description: Confirmed booking for departure from Hong Kong
returnTicket.details: Immigration may ask to see proof of your return flight or onward journey. Have your e-ticket or booking confirmation ready.

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or host contact information
accommodation.details: Bring hotel reservation confirmation or contact details of your host in Hong Kong, including address and phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Cash, credit cards, or bank statements
sufficientFunds.details: You may need to demonstrate you have enough money for your stay. Bring cash, credit cards, or recent bank statements.

healthDeclaration.title: Health declaration
healthDeclaration.description: Complete if required by current health regulations
healthDeclaration.details: Check if health declarations or COVID-related documents are needed. Complete any required forms before arrival.

success.title: You are ready!
success.subtitle: Next we will collect your travel details.

warning.title: Review each item
warning.subtitle: Ensure you meet all requirements before continuing.

info.title: Taiwan Entry Permit & Online Arrival Card
info.subtitle: Mainland Chinese passport holders require an entry permit

visa.title: ‚úì Entry Permit Policy
items: Mainland Chinese passport holders must apply for an Entry Permit (ÂÖ•Âè∞ËØÅ) before traveling to Taiwan.
‚Ä¢ Individual tourist permits (Ëá™Áî±Ë°å) available for select cities
‚Ä¢ Group tour permits available through travel agencies
‚Ä¢ Business and family visit permits require sponsorship
‚Ä¢ Processing time typically 3-7 business days

entry.title: üõÇ Entry Requirements
items: ‚Ä¢ Valid passport with at least 6 months validity
‚Ä¢ Valid Entry Permit (ÂÖ•Âè∞ËØÅ)
‚Ä¢ Complete Online Arrival Card before arrival
‚Ä¢ Return flight ticket
‚Ä¢ Accommodation confirmation or host contact information

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Complete the Online Arrival Card within 3 days before arrival
‚Ä¢ Have both your passport and Entry Permit ready for immigration
‚Ä¢ Keep confirmation email of Online Arrival Card
‚Ä¢ Declare all items truthfully at customs

requirements.introSubtitle: Required for all travelers entering Taiwan

validPermit.title: Valid Entry Permit
validPermit.details: Mainland Chinese travelers must have a valid Entry Permit. Ensure it covers your entire stay period.

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid for at least 6 months
validPassport.details: Taiwan requires passport validity of 6 months beyond entry date. Check and renew if needed.

emailVerification.title: Email verification
emailVerification.description: Access to email for receiving verification code
emailVerification.details: The online arrival card requires email verification. Use an email you can access to receive and enter the verification code.

travelDetails.title: Travel information ready
travelDetails.description: Flight details, accommodation, and contact information
travelDetails.details: Have your flight number, arrival date/time, Taiwan address, and local contact phone number ready.

healthHistory.title: 14-day travel history
healthHistory.description: Know which countries you visited in the past 14 days
healthHistory.details: The form asks about your travel history for the 14 days before arriving in Taiwan. Be prepared to list all countries visited.

success.title: You are ready!
success.subtitle: Next we will help you complete the online arrival card.

warning.title: Review each checklist item
warning.subtitle: Ensure you meet all requirements before proceeding.

visa.title: ‚úì Visa Policy
items: Since March 1, 2024, China and Thailand have mutual visa exemption. Chinese ordinary passport holders can enter Thailand visa-free for short stays.
‚Ä¢ Maximum 30 days per visit
‚Ä¢ Maximum 90 days cumulative stay within 180 days
‚Ä¢ For tourism, family visits, short-term business only (not for work)

entry.title: üõÇ Entry Requirements
items: ‚Ä¢ Passport valid for at least 6 months
‚Ä¢ Return flight ticket or proof of onward travel
‚Ä¢ Accommodation confirmation (hotel or address in Thailand)
‚Ä¢ Sufficient funds (cash, credit cards - at least 10,000 THB per person or 20,000 THB per family)
‚Ä¢ No TDAC required for visa-free entry (only for visa-on-arrival)

onsite.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Immigration may ask to see proof of funds, return ticket, and accommodation
‚Ä¢ Prohibited items: drugs, weapons, counterfeit goods, endangered species products
‚Ä¢ Respect Thai culture and customs
‚Ä¢ Keep your passport with you at all times

requirements.introSubtitle: Visa-free entry requirements for Chinese passport holders

validPassport.title: Passport validity
validPassport.description: Passport valid for at least 6 months
validPassport.details: Thailand requires passport validity of 6 months from entry date. Renew before travel if needed.

returnTicket.title: Return or onward ticket
returnTicket.details: Have your return flight booking or onward travel proof ready. Immigration may ask to verify your departure plans.

accommodation.title: Accommodation confirmation
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or address in Thailand
accommodation.details: Bring hotel reservation confirmation or have the address where you'll be staying, including contact phone number.

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: 10,000 THB per person or 20,000 THB per family
sufficientFunds.details: Proof of sufficient funds may be requested. Carry cash, show credit cards, or have bank statements available.

stayDuration.title: Stay duration limits
stayDuration.description: Maximum 30 days per visit, 90 days per 180 days
stayDuration.details: Ensure your planned stay doesn't exceed 30 days. If you've been in Thailand recently, check your cumulative stay within the past 180 days.

success.title: You are ready!
success.subtitle: Next we will collect your travel details.

warning.title: Review each checklist item
warning.subtitle: Ensure you meet all requirements before continuing.

visa.title: ‚úì Visa Requirements
items: No visa required! Chinese passport holders can enter Japan visa-free for tourism.
‚Ä¢ Stay duration: Up to 90 days
‚Ä¢ Purpose: Tourism and sightseeing only
‚Ä¢ Cannot extend or change status

duration.title: ‚è∞ Stay Duration
items: ‚Ä¢ Maximum 90 days per entry
‚Ä¢ No more than 90 days cumulative in 6 months
‚Ä¢ Plan your itinerary reasonably

important.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Must have clear tourism purpose
‚Ä¢ Cannot work or engage in business activities in Japan
‚Ä¢ Violations may result in entry refusal or deportation

requirements.introSubtitle: Ensure all requirements are met before traveling to Japan

validPassport.title: Valid passport
validPassport.description: Passport valid for at least 6 months
validPassport.details: Passport must be valid for more than 6 months from planned departure date

returnTicket.title: Return ticket
returnTicket.description: Confirmed return or onward journey ticket
returnTicket.details: Must have clear departure plan, showing you will leave Japan within 90 days

sufficientFunds.title: Sufficient funds
sufficientFunds.description: Proof of funds for entire stay
sufficientFunds.details: Recommended to carry at least 100,000 yen or equivalent, or show credit card/bank statements

accommodation.title: Accommodation proof
accommodation.description: Hotel booking or host contact in Japan
accommodation.details: Provide hotel reservation confirmation or detailed contact information of friends/relatives in Japan

success.title: You are ready!
success.subtitle: Next we will guide you through entry procedures.

warning.title: Please review each item
warning.subtitle: Ensure all requirements are met before continuing.

procedures.title: Complete Japan Entry Process
procedures.subtitle: BorderBuddy will help you prepare everything

helpSection.title: üìù What BorderBuddy Does for You
helpSection.description: We'll fill out the entry card and customs declaration for you, you just copy it at the airport!
helpSection.subdescription: Don't worry about making mistakes, just copy what we've prepared for you

steps.title: Arrive at airport
steps.description: Arrive at Japan airport immigration hall
steps.details: Prepare your passport and filled entry card and customs declaration

steps.title: Immigration inspection
steps.details: Submit passport and entry card, undergo officer inspection and fingerprint collection

steps.title: Customs declaration
steps.details: Submit customs declaration, declare items carried, may require baggage inspection

steps.title: Entry complete
steps.details: Get entry stamp on passport, officially enter Japan

features.title: ‚ú® What BorderBuddy Can Do for You

items.title: Auto-fill forms
items.description: We fill out entry card and declaration for you, you just copy

items.title: Information entry
items.description: Enter travel info once, system fills all forms automatically

items.title: No internet needed
items.description: View filled forms offline, works even without airport signal

items.title: Remember information
items.description: Save your details, use directly next time you visit Japan

importantNotes.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Reminders
items: ‚Ä¢ Entry card and customs declaration must be filled with black or blue pen
‚Ä¢ Handwriting must be clear, information must be accurate
‚Ä¢ Answer yes/no questions on declaration truthfully
‚Ä¢ Be polite and cooperate with inspections
‚Ä¢ Keep entry card stub until departure
